result.eng: He threatened that he would pull his party out of government.
result.ga: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtas
result.orig: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtas
result.html: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtasHe threatened that he would pull his party out of government.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sé go dtarraingeoḋ sé a ṗáirtí amaċ as an rialtasHe threatened that he would pull his party out of government.

result.eng: How will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?
result.ga: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochta
result.orig: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochta
result.html: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochtaHow will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?
result.ponchtml: Conas a ḋéileálfaiḋ an rialtas le faḋb na díḟostaíoċtaHow will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?

result.eng: If it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ga: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.orig: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.html: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ponchtml: Más aṁlaiḋ go ḃfuil na páirtiṫe sásta cuṁaċt a roinnt beiḋ coṁrialtas ann sul i ḃfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.

result.eng: She was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ga: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.orig: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtas
result.html: Dúradh léi go mbeadh uirthi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
result.ponchtml: Dúraḋ léi go mbeaḋ uirṫi €500 a íoc leis an rialtasShe was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
